com.epam.esm.repository.dao

Interface TagToGiftCertificateDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TagToGiftCertificateDaoImpl

    public interface TagToGiftCertificateDao
    The TagToGiftCertificateDao interface provides methods for creating, reading, and deleting gift certificates.
    Author:
    Yury Lapitski

      • deleteByGiftCertificateId

        boolean deleteByGiftCertificateId(Long giftCertificateId)
        Deletes tag to gift certificate relations by gift certificate ID
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the tag to gift certificate was deleted
